sentences.en: Color can also affect the mood of a garment, making it appear informal or dressy.
sentences.cn: 色彩也会影响服装情调, 可以使它显得潇酒或者时髦.

sentences.en: Could you help me pick up a dressy dress?
sentences.cn: 你能不能帮我挑一件美美的礼服?

sentences.en: Dressy occasions are becoming rare in today's casual atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 在现今轻松的气氛之下,正式的场合就不多见了.

sentences.en: Dressy shorts , too , are still in.
sentences.cn: 短 裙裤 也还在流行.

sentences.en: Dry - clean dressy jeans. This will keep the rinse darker and fresher - looking.
sentences.cn: 干洗做工精细考究的牛仔裤. 干洗可洗净衣物并保持原色不折旧.

sentences.en: Her outfit was smart but not too dressy.
sentences.cn: 她的衣服漂亮但又不过于正式。

sentences.en: It isn't always easy to pick an outfit that's dressy without being too formal.
sentences.cn: 因为选一套不太正式又时髦考究的衣服并不是一件容易的事.

sentences.en: Jeans are recruiting new fans among even dressy executives.
sentences.cn: 即便在衣着讲究的高管中,牛仔裤也不断获得新拥趸.

sentences.en: SHe has been more dressy since you come on the carpet.
sentences.cn: 自从认识你之后,他更加讲究穿着了.

sentences.en: The dressy manager was shaken by the hand three times in as many minutes.
sentences.cn: 在3分钟里,这个穿着讲究的经理就三次和人握手.

sentences.en: The latter's genial nature and dressy appearance pleased him.
sentences.cn: 杜洛埃为人和气,衣着讲究,这些都很合他的意.
他们俩是讲究穿着的一对儿.

sentences.en: Wise men pass a dressy lass.
Yes. I need a belt that is kind of casual and dressy.
sentences.cn: 是的.我需要一条腰带,不要太随意也不要太正式.

sentences.en: You can make the shoes go from casual to dressy.
sentences.cn: 你的魅力可以使到这双普通的休闲鞋看起来却像是时尚流行的鞋子.

words.tran_cn: 穿好衣服的；打扮好的；去内脏及分割加工好的（特指动物，如鱼，禽类等）
盛装舞步；花式骑术训练；驯马技术
穿衣；加工；调味品；装饰；梳理
装饰；给…穿衣；布置（dress的过去分词）
给…穿衣；为…打扮（dress的现在分词）

trans.tran_en: dressy clothes are suitable for formal occasions
